segments.text: I'd like to order room service to room 202 , please ,
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like two sandwiches and one green fruit salad , please .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No . Could you also get some extra towels and soup too ? We went to the pool today and used up our two clean towels .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I will have someone bring that up right away . How would like to pay for the dinner ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just put in on with the rest of my hotel bill .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , sir . You would receive dinner in about 15 minutes .
segments.speaker: S2
